stories.text: I was thinking of is there a place like a marketplace where i can browse open source projects, and contribute in my free time in those i really like ?
stories.title: Contributing on Open Source Projects?

The Integrity Institute’s Analysis of Facebook’s Widely Viewed Content Report

stories.text:
The sale of personal information by the government is something that has always really bothered me. This is a bill I drafted that would stop the DMV, voter registration, property tax records, and the post office from selling or publishing without explicit user consent.

It would also require personal information to be accompanied with the provenance of that data. This way, a user can track down who or what is publishing their data and take action to end their relationship with that company.

I would appreciate any feedback, because I am sure I am missing some second and third order effects that this would have.

Document open for comments - https://docs.google.com/document/d/1HVSrRrJwubRmgxTSExN0pEwumbo8REJeEUBK7QCW2gU/edit?usp=sharing

Privacy should be a right of the people. Thank you!
